quote: The law doesn't require truth, only the appearance of it. Most cases simply rest on a version of it that's acceptable to both sides. You want to know the only truth is? Everybody lies.--Elwin Stark
quote_letters: THE LAW DOESNT REQUIRE TRUTH ONLY THE APPEARANCE OF IT MOST CASES SIMPLY REST ON A VERSION OF IT THATS ACCEPTABLE TO BOTH SIDES YOU WANT TO KNOW THE ONLY TRUTH IS EVERYBODY LIES--ELWIN STARK
